item.description:
Let's try the first Rhode Island Atheist Society Bowling Night! We'll meet at East Providence Lanes for a few hours of bowling and, as always, spirited conversation.

The fee for each lane is $18.00 for the first hour ($12.00 for each hour thereafter) and shoe rental is $2.50. I think it would be easiest for folks to organize their own small bowling groups, depending on the number of attendees, and to make arrangements to pay the fees in that manner.

There is also a snack bar on site. Please check out their website for more details: http://www.eastprovid...

Please be sure bring the kids to this family friendly event!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will email participants prior to the meetup to let them know where to meet.
item.name: Postponed: Rhode Island Atheist Society - Bowling Night!
